maintenance_message: Maintenance Maintenance work in progress. Please try restarting the game later...
account_is_busy_message:
Access to your account is temporarily restricted.

The administrator is doing technical work. Please try restarting the game later...
daily_reminder_variant_0: Hero! We need you! Get back to work soon!
daily_reminder_variant_1: New enemies have been discovered on the map! Equip your best weapons and fight them!
daily_reminder_variant_2: The robbers won't defeat themselves! We need your help, hero!
daily_reminder_variant_3: Hero! While you were away, new opponents appeared on the map. Can you defeat them all?
daily_reminder_variant_4: Ilya Muromets spent 33 years on the stove. But you don't have to wait that long! Get back in the game, hero!
daily_reminder_variant_5: Adventure Road is waiting for you! Are you ready to hit the road?
dialog_town_text_newSession: You woke up in the town after a good sleep and ready for new adventures!
dialog_entry_name_description: Enter the name under which other players will see you. Name Requirements:

dialog_map_crossroads_is_locked:
Crossroads - Choose your path at the crossroads. The choice of path will determine the reward you will receive for defeating the enemy. - Gather fruits and use them to upgrade your character. 
Will be available at Town Hall level {0}
dialog_map_arena_is_locked:
Arena - Fight other heroes in the arena and earn arena chips. - Exchange arena chips for rare items in the shop arenas. 
Available at Town Hall level {0}
dialog_mob_battle_point_inventory_slots_: Your inventory does not have enough space for the items you will receive as a reward for this fight. To free up space, you can disassemble excess items into materials. To participate in this battle, you need at least {0} free spaces in your inventory

dialog_buildings_construction_blocked_be: You cannot upgrade a building while it is being crafted. Wait until the item is crafted and take it to your inventory.

dialog_shop_premium_description: Premium provides the following bonuses: {0} Instant health regeneration after each battle {0} 15% more resources per battle {0} 25% faster construction and building upgrades {0} 25% faster crafting of items and potions {0} Ability to upgrade twice as many buildings at the same time {0} Ability to store twice as many potions in inventory {0} Icon {1} next to your nickname {0} Every day you get {2} and {3} for logging in

You have already activated your premium for more than {0} days.

You will be able to renew it when there are less than {0} days left before the end of the premium.
dialog_shop_before_purchase: You are about to buy: {0} Clicking on the '{1}' button will take you to the site for accepting payments. After payment, the goods will be credited automatically. If you have any problems, please contact technical support.
dialog_shop_error_on_create_payment: An error occurred while invoicing. Please try again later or contact technical support...
dialog_shop_double_diamonds_bonus: Promotion: With the first purchase of diamonds, you will receive twice as much as it is written!
building_TownHall_description: The main building of the town. Its improvement opens access to new buildings
building_Tyr_description: This building supplies you with arrows that are used in battle
building_AlchemyLab_description: This building allows you to make potions that can be used in battle
building_AlchemyLab_unavailable_under_co: Crafting new potions is not available during construction
building_ElixirWorkshop_description: This building allows you to craft fruit elixirs that increase your item handling skill
building_ElixirWorkshop_unavailable_unde: Crafting elixirs is not available during construction
building_WeaponsWorkshop_description: This building allows you to craft swords, bows and staffs
building_ArmorWorkshop_description: This building allows you to craft armor, boots, helmets and shields
building_Jewerly_description: This building allows you to craft rings and amulets
building_ScribesHouse_description: This building allows you to craft scrolls

building_WoodProductionSecond_descriptio: This building extracts the wood needed to create items and upgrade buildings

building_production_is_full: Some of the production buildings are full. Collect resources!

building_WoodTraining_description: Allows you to train your lumberjacks to produce more wood

quest_main_start_journey_replica: From time immemorial, heroes have stood guard over the world. Possessing remarkable strength and good disposition, they protect people from all kinds of misfortunes, performing feats over and over again. So you, hero, have taken up military service. You went to a city to receive your first task. You have been walking for three days and three nights, but you still cannot see the city...
quest_main_start_robber_encounter_replic: As you continue your journey, you come across a robber who has molested a young girl. You realize that you can't get past...
quest_main_start_robber_tutorial_fight_r:
Tutorial: your first battle • All battles are turn-based • Each turn you choose one of the items you want to use: sword, bow, scroll, etc. • Combat lasts until the health of one of the opponents drops to zero • The player who goes second has the right to the last turn 
Win the battle!
quest_main_vasilisa_encounter_replica:
Good health to you, hero! It's only thanks to you that I didn't get into trouble...

What is your name?
quest_main_vasilisa_meeting_replica: My name is Vasilisa. I work in the hospital - I monitor the health of brave warriors and ordinary citizens. This hospital is located in a nearby town. Could you please walk me to it?
quest_main_journey_with_vasilisa_replica: You and Vasilisa went to the noble city. And it really turned out that it was not far away: before you had time to talk to the beautiful girl, majestic fortress walls decorated with red flags appeared in front of your eyes.
quest_loc_01_dobrynya_meeting_replica_1:
Welcome to the city, recruit!

My name is Dobrynya. I heard a lot about how you protected Vasilisa from a robber. My squad really needs warriors like you.
quest_loc_01_dobrynya_meeting_replica_2:
Recently, many robbers have divorced in the dark forest. They do not give rest to our inhabitants.

My first task for you is to go to this camp and deal with the villains.
quest_loc_01_dobrynya_bow_gift_replica:
I know that you are eager to fight, hero. But before heading to the bandit camp, let's talk about your equipment.

You already have your sword and armor. But besides them, other items may be needed in battle.

Here, take this bow. I'm sure it will serve you well.
quest_loc_01_tutorial_bow_replica:
Tutorial: Bow • You can take both sword and bow at the same time in each battle. The sword can be used every turn, but the bow can only be used if you have arrows. • The stock of arrows is restored after each battle. • Currently, you can only use the bow once per battle. In the future, you can increase this figure. 
Go to the inventory section and equip the bow
quest_loc_01_dobrynya_first_travel_repli: Now you're ready for battle, hero! Go to the dark forest and find the bandit camp!
quest_loc_01_point_01_travel_replica: You left the city and headed towards the dark forest. After several hours, you finally reached it. At first glance, there was nothing unusual about him. But with some inner feeling, you clearly felt that this forest is full of secrets. Soon you stumbled upon a young wolf, who was staring at you with his hungry eyes
quest_loc_01_point_01_battle_win_replica: You pacified the hungry wolf and continued on your way through the dark forest. And you saw an old man coming to meet you. It seemed to you that he was walking towards you in advance. As if knowing that you will be in this forest
quest_loc_01_magus_meeting_replica:
Hello, young hero!

Now you are at the beginning of your journey and many achievements are still waiting for you. If the stars do not lie, you will have to make a significant contribution to the revival of the Russian land...
